INSERT INTO exam_question (id, stem, `key`, analysis, type, difficulty, position, purpose, parent_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{stem}, #{key}, #{analysis}, #{type}, #{difficulty}, #{position}, #{purpose}, #{parentId})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE stem = #{stem}, `key` = #{key}, analysis = #{analysis}, type = #{type}, difficulty = #{difficulty}, position = #{position}, purpose = #{purpose}, parent_id = #{parentId}

INSERT INTO exam_question_option (id, description, is_correct, position, mark, question_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{description}, #{correct}, #{position}, #{mark}, #{questionId})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE description = #{description}, is_correct = #{correct}, position = #{position}, mark = #{mark}, question_id = #{questionId}
